page.title: 15Ropley Pram Race
page.content: The Ropley Pram Race is an exciting event which is held each year on spring bank holiday Monday.The race goes round the three pubs in Ropley and keen competitors practise around the course in the weeks before the race.There are sections for men,ladies and children.You need fast runners if you want to win but some people just enter the decorated pram competition and some run the course for fun.Some of the decorated prams are very good and a lot of time is spent preparing them.The winner this year was made into a tank.The race starts at the rec.and the course goes first to the Star,then the Chequers and finally to the Anchor.At each pub the adult competitors have to drink half a pint of shandy.The winners get a cup to keep for the year.Then there is a fete and everyone has a good time.
